page.title: 08KIPPEN FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: {The Forth and Endrick League}was formed in{1910}with{Kippen}being one of the{founden members.}Teams played for the{Cameron Cup}which was donated by{D.E.Cameron Esq.of Maryhill.}Kippen were the beaten finalists.{1984}saw {Kippen}once again in the final,beating {Buchlyvie}in extra time by 2 goals to 1 to win the cup.This year{five {brothers}are playing for the Kippen football team:Alan,Colin,Martin,Norman and Raymond Ainslie.Perhaps this is a record!During the season the club meet at the football park behind{Oakwood twice a week for training.
